snippet: In this week's installment of The Choice on India Ink, Latha Ramchand, a native of India who is now the dean of the University of Houston's business school, offers advice for prospective international students.
abstract: In this week's installment of The Choice on India Ink, Latha Ramchand, a native of India who is now the dean of the University of Houston's business school, offers advice for prospective international students.

headline.main: Answers Every Indian Student Should Know Before Applying to College
